name: ALEIDE Web Agency
industry: Digital Marketing, Web Development, Software Development
description: ALEIDE Web Agency, founded in 2009, is a leading digital agency and software house based in Milan and Padova, serving clients across Northern Italy. The agency specializes in custom website and ecommerce development, SEO consulting, mobile app development, custom software, online contests, and comprehensive digital marketing strategies. ALEIDE emphasizes project management, client collaboration, and quality, holding ISO 9001 certification and Google Partner status.
services_offered: Totem Multimediali and Digital Signage Solutions
certifications_and_partnerships: ISO 9001 Certification for IT Consulting and Assistance
Google Partner Certified for Google Ads
Google Cloud Partner for Google Workspace
SEMrush Certified Partner for SEO Consulting

founders.name: Filippo Levizzani
founders.background: Over 20 years of IT experience, previously worked at Studio Pontaccio, Portel, IDM Group.
